library

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Storing data describing a task. Can be serialized and then loaded.
    Author:
    csiki
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
